project.name: 金曲29 最佳原住民語專輯獎
project.en_name: Golden Melody Awards Ceremony 29th - Best Aboriginal Album
msg: The Golden Melody Award (GMA) is Taiwan's most prominent music ceremony, and it holds a special place in my heart as it has been my usual project for five times since 2018 when I was a student and took an Internship at JL Design.

During the three-month period leading up to the ceremony, we worked diligently to create the main visual, which included several elements aimed at producing a captivating TV package. It was a challenging yet rewarding experience, and each year, the project allowed me to grow both personally and professionally.

credit.監製 Executive Producer: 巫安琪 Angela Moo、蔡卓翰 Johan Tsai
credit.美術指導 Art Director: 魏良恩 Lance Wei、洪湘茹 Hsiang Ju Hung
credit.最佳原住民語專輯入圍影片動態設計: JL DESIGN （鄭盛文 Mos Zheng 、劉瓅涵 Hank Liu ）
credit.最佳原住民語專輯入圍影片片頭歌曲: 在這土地上 On This Land

project.name: 金馬56 Logo Bumper
msg: Golden Horse Award (GHA) is the Taiwan biggest movie ceremony, The main concept behind the event want to reveals a wild horse, symbolizing power and determination, hiding in the darkness and ready to take action, my mission is to make the main visual looks perfect.

Our motion team have only three members, I have to build a high detail horse and create VFX of the horse, this is my first time to study a whole new workflow and make procedural texture of the horse hoof. During the project, I study horse anatomy and gazing the horse hoof references everyday just want to study every detail make the texture looks perfect. As I delved deeper into the process, I developed a modeling and texturing workflow that allowed me to achieve the desired outcome.

The journey was both thrilling and rewarding. Each day brought new discoveries and learning experiences, me and my team love the magnificent result. and I am honored to have played a part in bringing its essence to life through our captivating main visual.

project.name: Taiwan HYPE
msg: JL DESIGN interprets the sincerity, respect, and human touch of Taiwan by representing temple culture and language through modern design. They create a new life form by crossbreeding the five sacrificial animals known as the 'Five Livestock' - chicken, pig, fish, duck, and squid - as a vehicle for cross-cultural technology.The design elements visually reveal hidden animal features within the outlines, reminiscent of the distinctive attributes of each creature, while incorporating Taiwan's unique phonetic system, the 'Zhuyin Fuhao' (Bopomofo) as an assistance system.

credit.Client: Ministry of Culture of Taiwan 文化部 、Taiwan Creative Content Agency (TAICCA ) 文化內容策進院
credit.Project Manager: Yu-Chien Chang 張毓倩、Tang Wei 唐瑋、Ryan Lin 林志翰、Tyne Huang 黃婷鈺

project.name: KKcompany
msg: KKcompany is my favorite project during my time at MixCode studio. I use Houdini to create 3D references for motion designers, and Photoshop to draw rough animations for the Cel animator. In my own 3D animation part, I utilize Arnold to render Cel animation in Cinema 4D.
The entire project has been an amazing journey; the characters are so cute that I feel excited every day. I thoroughly enjoy working on interesting projects and experimenting with several materials.

credit.導演 Director: 柯鈞譯 Chiunyi Ko、李孟栩 TuBo Lee

project.name: 大慶證券債券＋系列產品形象影片
msg: Collaborating with the talented illustrator Taku Bannai, we develop a series animation of financial product, We've chosen to the Cel animation to bring these concepts to life, infusing them with a charm and visual. Our goal is to not only educate but also entertain our audience, making complex financial information more accessible and enjoyable.

credit.動畫設計: 齊慕夷、鄭盛文、張超傑、林俊德、謝皓宇
